selected_quotes: 1000 dams down and counting: Dam removals are reconnecting rivers in the United States
1000 dams have already been removed in the United States to connect waterways
How do rivers respond when large dams are removed? (the US has removed over 1000 recently)
1000 US #dams taken down in last 40 yrs. New
A dam removal movement in the US? This graph answers that question!

news.title: The Undamming of America

news.summary: In two very different parts of North America, two rivers are being transformed.

facebook.title: DamNation
facebook.summary:
A dam removal movement in the US?
This graph clearly answers that question!!

And the new study, covered in the magazine Science, shows the clear benefits that over a 1000 dam removal projects are having on watersheds around the country. The tide (or flow)

facebook.title: DamNation
facebook.summary: Let's keep this trend of dam removals FLOWING in the United States for the future of our rivers, wild fish populations and most importantly us humans. Let's keep the pressure on the  Washington State officials for the removal of the 4 Lower Snake dams. Dam
